death.attack.sword_aura.item: %1$s was slain by %2$s's sword aura using %3$s
enchantment.fabricmod.sword_aura.desc: Enables the sword to release sword aura. Higher levels increase the power
enchantment.fabricmod.thunder_mastery.de: Increases the number of lightning bolts summoned by the magic wand
enchantment.fabricmod.anti_gravity.desc: Reverses the gravity of attacked entities
advancement.fabricmod.go_brave_warrior.d: Fate has opened the gate to The End for you
enchantment.fabricmod.voice_control.desc: Control jump height with your voice
gui.fabricmod.audio_device.title: Select Audio Input Device
item.fabricmod.voice_control_boots.toolt: Hover and press %s to switch audio device
message.fabricmod.audio_device.hint: Hover over boots and press %s to switch audio input device
item.fabricmod.quantum_entanglement.tool: Right click on entity to bind
item.fabricmod.golden_quantum_entangleme: Distributes damage equally among all receivers and summons lightning
item.fabricmod.mythical_quantum_entangle: Distributes damage equally among all receivers and summons lightning, and summons meteor
